value: Mont Orgueil castle is in the parish

Bus route no. 1 runs from St Helier to Gorey Pier.

The coastline. Easiest if you walk: it's 400 yards from St Catherine's Breakwater to Fliquet on foot and about three miles if you drive. The section from St Catherine to Rozel is one of the most attractive parts of Jersey.

There are several restaurants to be found on Gorey Pier, at the foot of Mont Orgueil.

The Royal Inn, next to St Martin's Church (bus 3, 3A) does very respectable pub grub at a reasonable price.
